roleset.name: make a reaction
roleset.note: COUNTER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'counter' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. No comparison. (from counter.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: just prompting of action
example.text: But LTV's move marks the first effort by [a major steelmaker]-1 *trace*-1 to counter the free fall in spot prices.
example.arg: the free fall in spot prices

example.name: with reaction
example.text: John countered Mary's intelligent objection to his ideas with a screaming tantrum.
example.arg: Mary's intelligent objection to his ideas
